subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Gilles Simon of France rallied to beat Mikhail Youznhy of Russia, 3-6, 6-3, 6-1, on Saturday to advance to the final of the German Open against Nicolas Almagro in Hamburg.
snippet: Gilles Simon of France rallied to beat Mikhail Youznhy of Russia, 3-6, 6-3, 6-1, on Saturday to advance to the final of the German Open against Nicolas Almagro in Hamburg.
